item.title: Figure Technology’s IPO pricing a sign of strong demand for crypto company’s stock
item.description: Figure Technology raises $788 million at $25 a share, after upsizing the offering by 5.2 million shares.

item.title: S&P 500’s rejection of the company formerly called MicroStrategy may stop the crypto-acquisition frenzy: JPMorgan
item.description: The S&P 500’s refusal to include the company previously called MicroStrategy raises questions about the sustainability of the business model of corpor...

item.title: First-time unemployment claims surge to highest level since 2021 — but most of the increase is tied to Texas flooding
item.description: Initial jobless claims rose by 27,000 to 263,000 in the week that ended Sept. 6, the Labor Department said Thursday.

item.title: My wife, 48, is financially illiterate. I’m 67. What happens to our real estate and investments when I die?
item.description: “We have a 12-year-old daughter. I have $1.1 million in a traditional IRA and $250,000 in cash.”

item.title: Nvidia’s stock is deemed a buy. The future looks even brighter on ‘the only thing that matters.’
